snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry will visit Egypt on Sunday, a day before Mohamed Morsi, the deposed president, is to make his first court appearance.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry will travel to Egypt in his first visit since the military deposed Pres Mohamed Morsi in July; Kerry is scheduled to arrive day before Morsi is to make his first court appearance on murder charges.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry will visit Egypt on Sunday, a day before Mohamed Morsi, the deposed president, is to make his first court appearance.

headline.main: Kerry Plans Brief Stop in Egypt, His First Since Military Takeover, State Media Report
headline.print_headline: Kerry Plans Brief Stop in Egypt, His First Since Military Takeover, State Media Report
